name: Frosty Heights
description:
Welcome to the 9th circle.
Frosty Heights adds a new dimension to the game, The Hiemal.
The Hiemal is a mysterious and mystical land of icicles and soul searching foe. Watch where you step as going in unprotected can be your downfall, into the icy void below.
Author List:
LudoCrypt - Musician and Developer
Slice - The soul reason this mod exists, and our main artist!
Roberto - Secondary Developer
shadowmaster435 - Tertiary Developer, mainly AI
Phantom - Story/Lore Writer
Uraneptus - Promotional Management
Cauliflower - Secondary Artist
Tamakii - My good friend to keep the mod in a direction of the public!

We are Team Crypt. Glad to have you enjoy our mods.
